Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: â€¢ The people have spoken, and they're not holding back! From calls for better fiscal responsibility and skepticism about upcoming meetings, to a hopeful survey about engaging with the Federal Budget, Twitter is the hub for all opinions on Australian politics. With talks of government accountability and capturing systems, the country's people are expressing excitement, anger, and everything in between. Who said politics had to be boring? Get ready to click that "like" button and be part of the conversation!
